greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers k such that A136370(k) is prime.
mathematica: f=1; Do[ p=Prime[n]; f=f - (-1)^(n+1)*1/p^2; g=Numerator[f] ;If[ PrimeQ[g], Print[ {n, g} ] ], {n, 1, 100} ]
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Dec 27 2007
ext: More terms added and edited by _Alexander Adamchuk_, Sep 15 2010
